alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 06 at 12:47PM AKST until November 07 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 4 PM AKST MONDAY FOR AREAS WEST OF THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER MOUTH... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Coastal Flood Advisory, which is in effect from 6 AM to 4 PM AKST Monday. * LOCATION...Coastal areas west of the Kuskokwim River mouth. * COASTAL FLOODING... Water levels are expected to rise 4 to 6 feet above normal highest tide. * TIMING...During the high tide cycle Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor inundation of low-lying coastal areas. Potential for minor beach erosion. The areas of sea ice near the coast are not expected to influence the coastal surge, but there is the possibility for ice shoves.
info.instruction: A coastal flood advisory indicates that onshore winds and tides will combine to generate flooding of low areas along the shore.
